Summary: Saw Unidentifed object over bear mouintain in So. Ca
trends: there have been no other sightings in bear lake? \palm sprimgs
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi saw a bright pulsating yellow\white object hovering over bear mountain from palm springs calofornia at 5:00am this morning. it slowly descended from the top of the mountain, and i observed it descent fron 10,500 ft to about 4000 ft in less then 10 seconds. i kept wanting to rationalize this thinking that this was some sort of plane crash - but there was no explosion. i did not seen anything on the news about this. i cannot be the only person who saw this. randal ollinger
